name: Social Media Broadcasts(SMB) Ltd.
description: Developer of a big data analytics SaaS platform created to help people make better business decisions. The company's analytics platform allows data discovery from multiple social and online sources, particularly Chinese-specific platforms, transforming granular data into reliable social intelligence enabling marketers, researchers and analysts to monitor social media sites and benchmark performance, identify market trends and gain in-depth insights into social behavior.
